content:
Three-quarters of gun deaths occur in just 15 countries

FOR more than 500 years guns have been responsible for meting out violence. A new paper published in JAMA , a medical journal, by the Institute for Health Metrics and Evaluation at the University of Washington provides perhaps the best global estimates to date of how severe that violence is. The paper finds that in 2016 alone some 250,000 people were killed by guns (the study excludes deaths from war and at the hands of police). In total, between 1990 and 2016, some 6.5m people were killed by firearms, greater than the number that succumbed to typhoid fever or alcohol-related deaths.

The new data show that gun violence is extremely concentrated. Just 15 countries—representing 35% of the world’s population—account for 75% of all gun deaths. While India is reckoned to have suffered 26,000 gun deaths in 2016, its firearm death rate, at 2.6 per 100,000 people, is 25% lower than the global average. Gun violence is worst in the Americas: in El Salvador, Guatemala and Venezuela, it exceeds 30 firearm deaths per 100,000 people, the vast majority of it murderous. 

In 90 countries more people are killed by guns in suicides than in murders. In America, twice as many people killed themselves with a gun in 2016 than were murdered by one. Germany had fewer than 100 gun murders in 2016 but suffered from around 1,000 gun-related suicides. It is not all grim reading. Overall, per head of population, firearm deaths are decreasing, largely because suicide is becoming less prevalent.

How will this affect your next performance ?
这将如何影响您下一步的性能评价？
Therefore, the critical Evaluation need is one of measurement, and this should be the primary goal of the tester in this phase.
因此，关键的评估需求是其中一个度量，并且这应该是此阶段测试人员主要的目标。

eg2: If you have not used a Metric lately, why are you still collecting it?
如果您最近不使用某个度量标准，那么为什么您仍旧收集它呢？
For every , you should specify what action you should take based on certain threshold values.
对于每个度量标准，您应该指定根据某个阀值应该采取什么行动。
Whatever your Metric of success, you can go back and see just how far you’ve come.
无论你衡量成功的标准是什么，你都可以回顾过去，并看到你已经走了那么远。

Blindingly white and dizzyingly high, this vast salt flat near the crest of the Andes could easily be mistaken for a Salvador Dali painting.
铺天盖地的白令人眩晕的高，这片几近安第斯山顶的大盐湖很容易被当成萨尔瓦多达利的油画。
After years of attention deficit in Washington, Obama's nod to the south enchanted his hosts in Chile and El .
在华盛顿当局多年以来的冷落之后，奥巴马在南部的智利和萨尔瓦多受到了青睐。

ex: v. 降低；减少；缩小；减弱
n. 减少；减小量；所减少的总量；减缩位置
网络 下降；减少量；减少之量
eg2: The number of new students decreased from 210 to 160 this year.
今年新生人数从 210 减少到 160。
a decreasing population
逐渐减少的人口
The price of wheat has decreased by 5%.
小麦价格降低了 5%。
This species of bird is decreasing in numbers every year.
这种鸟的数量在逐年减少。
People should decrease the amount of fat they eat.
人们应减少脂肪的摄入量。
There has been some decrease in military spending this year.
今年的军费开支有所减少。
a decrease of nearly 6% in the number of visitors to the museum
参观博物馆人数下降将近 6%

因此对那些抵押已经超过他们房屋价值的人来说，参与这项贷款并不具有吸引力。

但是有一个例外，很严峻。
"He should not nod and smile at me for all that- the black, , ugly-eyed old man!" said Pearl.
“那个长得又黑又吓人、眼睛很丑的老头儿，才不会因为这个对我点头微笑呢！” 珠儿说。

ex: adj. 杀人的，残忍的；凶残的；蓄意谋杀的
eg2: What they end up doing is colluding with murderous family-run regimes.
但是它们最终却和凶残的家族政权勾结了起来。
Haggis also gave her the role of a murderous drug addict in “The Next Three Days.
哈吉斯还给了她一个角色，在《未来三天》中扮演一个残忍的瘾君子。
Of course, WHO still has its epidemiologists who fly to outbreaks and do what they can to stop murderous microbes.
当然，世界卫生组织仍有一些流行病学家，他们飞往疾病暴发地区，尽他们的能力阻止杀人的细菌。

ex: adj. 流行的；普遍的，广传的
eg2: Where these 'lobster gangs' are , there are more lobsters.
在这些“龙虾帮”流行的地方，有更多的龙虾。
But since then, researchers worldwide have learnt much more about both the scale of the problem and the risk factors making these diseases increasingly .
但是从那以后，全世界的科学家对这个问题的程度以及让这些疾病越来越流行的风险因素有了更多的了解。
And I think there is too little written on how to integrate them together even though it is a very prevalent practice. Especially in the large HPC labs and universities.
尽管将两者集成在一起是非常普遍的实践（尤其是在一些大型的 HPC 实验室和大学里），但是我发现很少有文章对此进行介绍。

wp.reckon with: 处理;估计到;对付;预料到

你是这里的老板吧，我猜想。
Did you  in the cost of the taxi?
你把坐计程车的费用计算在内了吗?
We reckon him to be the best goalkeeper in the world.
我们认为他是世界上最好的足球守门员。

ex: vt. 代表；表现；描绘；回忆；再赠送

他们是谁？又代表了什么重要性？
They have delegated him to  their city at the convention.
他们选举他代表他们市去参加代表大会。
What do these electrons ?
这些电子代表什么？

ex: vi. 屈服；死；被压垮

wp.succumb to: 屈服于;死于;屈从;屈从于

eg2: And yet I succumb to watching it.
然而，我却需要看它，向它屈服。
Whatever you do, don't  to it.
无论你做什么，都不要屈服于它。
But why did a once-mighty civilisation succumb to the West?
但为什么，一个一度强大的文明竟会屈服于西方呢？

ex: n. 自杀；自杀性行为；自毁；自取灭亡的行为
adj. 自杀的；自杀性的
v. 自杀
网络 自杀者；自杀之谜；自杀论
eg2: to commit suicide
自杀
an attempted suicide(= one in which the person survives)
自杀未遂
a suicide letter/note(= written before sb tries to commit suicide )
绝命书
a suicide bomber(= who expects to die while trying to kill other people with a bomb)
自杀式爆炸者
It would have been political suicide for him to challenge the allegations in court.
假如当时他在法庭上质疑那些指控，那无异于自毁政治前程。

ex: adj. 伤寒的；斑疹伤寒症的
n. 伤寒

wp.typhoid bacillus: 肠窒扶斯杆菌;伤寒杆菌;翻译
wp.bilious typhoid: 黄疸型回归热;外耳氏病

eg2: The result may be an increase in diseases such as cholera, , malaria and dengue.
结果可能是疾病增加，例如霍乱、伤寒、疟疾和登革热。
This means it can be targeted through vaccination — and typhoid could potentially be eradicated.
这意味着它可以通过免疫接种加以防控——而且伤寒有可能被根除。
For instance, the institute already has strong links with research centres in South-East Asia working on .
例如，该研究所已经与东南亚研究伤寒的一些研究中心建立了紧密联系。

Title: Gun violence has killed 6.5m people worldwide since 1990

paperStatistics.title: Gun violence has killed 6.5m people worldwide since 1990
paperStatistics.desc: Three-quarters of gun deaths occur in just 15 countries
